languages.text: Ритуалы становятся каждодневными и отнимают у людей все больше рабочего времени. Никакие угрозы и наказания уже не могут вернуть их к прежнему образу жизни.
The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
languages.original_text: Ритуалы становятся каждодневными и отнимают у людей все больше рабочего времени. Никакие угрозы и наказания уже не могут вернуть их к прежнему образу жизни.

traits.locale_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
The rituals become part of everyday life, and the colony's inhabitants start to show greater diligence and complaisance
The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
The rituals become part of everyday life, and the colony's inhabitants start to show greater diligence and complaisance

The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

languages.text: Les rituels deviennent un élément de la vie courante et empiètent de plus en plus sur les horaires de travail des habitants. Désormais, il n'existe plus aucune menace ni aucun châtiment qui puisse les inciter à renouer avec leurs anciennes coutumes.
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

traits.locale_text: Les rituels deviennent un élément de la vie courante et empiètent de plus en plus sur les horaires de travail des habitants. Désormais, il n'existe plus aucune menace ni aucun châtiment qui puisse les inciter à renouer avec leurs anciennes coutumes.

languages.text: 儀式は日常生活の一部となり、人々の労働時間の多くを占めるようになる。今では、彼らを以前のやり方に戻らせられるような脅しも罰も存在しない。
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

traits.locale_text: 儀式は日常生活の一部となり、人々の労働時間の多くを占めるようになる。今では、彼らを以前のやり方に戻らせられるような脅しも罰も存在しない。

languages.text: 这些仪式已经成为了民众日常生活的一部分，占用了人们越来越多的劳动时间。如今，无论是威胁还是惩罚，都无法再让民众恢复到原本的状态。
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

traits.locale_text: 这些仪式已经成为了民众日常生活的一部分，占用了人们越来越多的劳动时间。如今，无论是威胁还是惩罚，都无法再让民众恢复到原本的状态。

languages.text: Los rituales pasan a ser parte de la vida cotidiana y ocupan una parte cada vez mayor del horario laboral de la gente. Ya no hay amenaza ni castigo alguno que pueda hacer que vuelvan a las anteriores costumbres.
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

traits.locale_text: Los rituales pasan a ser parte de la vida cotidiana y ocupan una parte cada vez mayor del horario laboral de la gente. Ya no hay amenaza ni castigo alguno que pueda hacer que vuelvan a las anteriores costumbres.

languages.text: Die Rituale werden Teil des alltäglichen Lebens und beanspruchen immer mehr und mehr wertvolle Arbeitszeit. Nun gibt es keine Drohung oder Strafe mehr, die sie zwingen könnte, wieder wie früher zu leben.
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.

traits.locale_text: Die Rituale werden Teil des alltäglichen Lebens und beanspruchen immer mehr und mehr wertvolle Arbeitszeit. Nun gibt es keine Drohung oder Strafe mehr, die sie zwingen könnte, wieder wie früher zu leben.

languages.text: Ayinler, günlük yaşamın bir parçası hâline geliyor ve insanların mesai saatlerinden giderek daha fazla zaman alıyor. Artık onları eski düzenlerine döndürebilecek hiçbir tehdit veya ceza yok.
languages.original_text: The rituals become part of everyday life and take up more and more of people's labour hours. Now there is no threat or punishment that could make them return to their former ways.
